naif[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9].tls.description: SPICE LSK file incorporating leapseconds up to TBD, created by NAIF, JPL.

pck[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9].tpc.description: SPICE text PCK file containing constants from the IAU TDB report, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_v[0-9][0-9].tf.description: SPICE FK file defining reference frames the INSIGHT lander, its structures, and science instruments, created by NAIF, JPL.

marcoa_v[0-9][0-9].tf.description: SPICE FK file defining reference frames the MARCO-A spacecraft, its structures, and instruments, and FOVs for its structures and instruments, created by NAIF, JPL.

marcob_v[0-9][0-9].tf.description: SPICE FK file defining reference frames the MARCO-B spacecraft, its structures, and instruments, and FOVs for its structures and instruments, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_ant_v[0-9][0-9].ti.description: SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions and other instrument parameters for the INSIGHT antennas, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_hp3_rad_v[0-9][0-9].ti.description: SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions for the INSIGHT Heat Flow and Physical Properties Package (HP3) Radiometer instrument, created by HP3 Team, DLR.

insight_icc_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-.description: SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions and other instrument parameters for the INSIGHT Instrument Context Camera (ICC) instrument, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_idc_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-.description: SPICE IK file providing FOV definitions and other instrument parameters for the INSIGHT Instrument Deployment Camera (IDC) instrument, created by NAIF, JPL.

nsy_sclkscet_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9].t.description: SPICE SCLK file containing time correlation data for the main INSIGHT on-board clock, created by NAIF, JPL. The original name of this file was NSY_SCLKSCET.$VERSION.tsc.

insight_lmst_ops[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE SCLK file implementing INSIGHT Local Mean Solar Time (LMST), created by NAIF, JPL.

marcoa_fake_v[0-9][0-9].tsc.description: SPICE SCLK file containing fictitious MARCO-A clock correlation data required to access MARCO-A CKs, created by NAIF, JPL.

marcob_fake_v[0-9][0-9].tsc.description: SPICE SCLK file containing fictitious MARCO-B clock correlation data required to access MARCO-B CKs, created by NAIF, JPL.

de[0-9][0-9][0-9]s*.bsp.description: SPICE SPK file containing JPL planetary ephemerides version $VER, created by the Solar System Dynamics group (SSD), JPL.

mar[0-9][0-9][0-9]s*.bsp.description: SPICE SPK file containing JPL Martian satellite ephemerides version $VER, created by the Solar System Dynamics group (SSD), JPL.

insight_cru_.*_v[0-9].bsp.description: SPICE SPK file containing reconstructed INSIGHT cruise trajectory, created by the INSIGHT NAV Team, JPL.

insight_edl_.*_v[0-9].bsp.description: SPICE SPK file containing reconstructed INSIGHT Entry Descent Landing (EDL) trajectory, created by the INSIGHT EDL Team, LMCO.

insight_ls_ops[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][.description: SPICE SPK file containing actual INSIGHT landing site location, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_atls_ops[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE SPK file containing the INSIGHT lander (zero) offset with respect to the landing site, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_struct_v[0-9][0-9].bsp.description: SPICE SPK file containing relative locations of selected INSIGHT structures and science instruments, created by NAIF, JPL.

marcoa_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]_[0.description: SPICE SPK file containing reconstructed MARCO-A cruise trajectory, created by the MARCO NAV Team, JPL.

marcob_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]_[0.description: SPICE SPK file containing reconstructed MARCO-B cruise trajectory, created by the MARCO NAV Team, JPL.

insight_idc_rec_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE SPK file containing deflected (gravity-compensated) position of the INSIGHT Instrument Deployment Camera (IDC), covering only IDC image times, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_cru_rec_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed INSIGHT spacecraft cruise orientation, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_edl_rec_v[0-9].bc.description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed INSIGHT spacecraft Entry Descent Landing (EDL) orientation, created the INSIGHT EDL Team, LMCO.

insight_surf_ops_v[0-9].bc.description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed INSIGHT spacecraft landed orientation, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_cruise2lander_v[0-9].bc.description: SPICE CK file containing fixed rotation between the INSIGHT cruise and lander frames, covering cruise and EDL, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_lander2cruise_v[0-9].bc.description: SPICE CK file containing fixed rotation between the INSIGHT lander and cruise frames, covering surface operations, created by NAIF, JPL.

marcoa_cru_rec_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9].description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed MARCO-A orientation, created by NAIF, JPL.

marcob_cru_rec_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9].description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed MARCO-B orientation, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_ida_enc_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed orientation of the INSIGHT Instrument Deployment Arm (IDA), encoder-based, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_ida_pot_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE CK file containing reconstructed orientation of the INSIGHT Instrument Deployment Arm (IDA), potentiometer-based, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_idc_enc_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE CK file containing deflected (gravity-compensated) orientation of the INSIGHT Instrument Deployment Camera (IDC), covering only IDC image times, encoder-based, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_idc_pot_[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9.description: SPICE CK file containing deflected (gravity-compensated) orientation of the INSIGHT Instrument Deployment Camera (IDC), covering only IDC image times, potentiometer-based, created by NAIF, JPL.

insight_v[0-9][0-9].tm.description: SPICE MK file listing kernels for the whole mission and including CHRONOS setup parameters, created by NAIF, JPL.
